results.t: Russ Cox is stepping down from Go Tech Lead position
results.p: Highly recommend reading his design philosophy for these AIs. He's finding where they have uses while building non-AI tools to shore things up.

results.t: Russ Cox | Author and Illustrator | Smiling Otis Studio
